== Debian Ubuntu Community Conference ==

=== Goal ===
* Make people from both communities know each other
* Make people known each other tools and methologies
* Have fun together :)

=== Format ===
* The conference format is based on talks about how to contribute to both distribution.
* All the talks were held by member from both communities
* the message to the public was "Discover how to partecipate in Ubuntu and Debian"
 
=== Topic covered ===
* How to start contributing
* Packaging
* Translations
* Testing
* Bug Report
* Bug Triage
* Marketing

=== Results ===
* We had a lot of fun :)
* Classes from a technical high school attended the session
* Lot of users from both distribution, other projects/distribution
